import axios from"axios";var url="http://comp-523-api-aghayes.apps.cloudapps.unc.edu";var api={login:function login(body,callback){var path="".concat(url,"/login");axios.put(path,{name:body.name,password:body.password}).then(function(response){callback(response.data);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});},register:function register(body,callback){var path="".concat(url,"/register");axios.post(path,{name:body.name,password:body.password,role:body.role}).then(function(response){callback(response.data);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});}// TODO 
};export default api;
